Hi there: Thanks for getting back to us with such a detailed report—we really appreciate the time and effort you put into gathering this information!
We haven’t been able to reproduce the issue yet
column2: but we’ve shared your findings with our engineering team and are actively looking into it. If you happen to notice anything else

column2: YouTube is an incredibly complex platform
column3: and resolving this may take some time

column2: and feel free to reach out if you have any other questions!
